General.Name: Huayi Brothers Media Corp
General.Description: Huayi Brothers Media Corporation operates as an entertainment media company in China and internationally. The company is involved in film and television entertainment, including film production, distribution, and derivative business; production, distribution and derivative business of TV series; artist brokerage and related service business; theater investment, management, operation and other businesses; movie ticket online business; and digital projection equipment sales business, etc. It also engages in Internet entertainment, such as new media, internet games, fan economy, VR technology, and entertainment applications; and brand licensing. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Huayi Brothers Office Building, Beijing, China, 100027
